## Description {#details}

The classes here represent processor resource units and their management strategy.

These classes are managed by the Scheduler.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns the actual resource consumed by this Use.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#a961b7aeaca000c803c0f4b1df4d26c27">ResourceRef</a> ResourceManager::selectPipe(uint64&#95;t ResourceID) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#ae652ac0aafced9e7ef6249d3b4e50171">getResourceStateIndex</a>(ResourceID);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ResourceState &amp;RS = &#42;Resources&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RS.isReady() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;No available units to select!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResourceManager::use(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResourceRef &amp;RR) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark the sub-resource referenced by RR as used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RSID = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#ae652ac0aafced9e7ef6249d3b4e50171">getResourceStateIndex</a>(RR.first);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ResourceState &amp;RS = &#42;Resources&#91;RSID&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  RS.markSubResourceAsUsed(RR.second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remember to update the resource strategy for non-group resources with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// multiple units.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RS.getNumUnits() &gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Strategies&#91;RSID&#93;-&gt;used(RR.second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are still available units in RR.first,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then we are done.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RS.isReady())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  AvailableProcResUnits ^= RR.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Notify groups that RR.first is no longer available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp/#a4e5b9edb51eec9dbca592075eb64dfcb">Users</a> = Resource2Groups&#91;RSID&#93;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">      it-&gt;second--;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!it-&gt;second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ConsumedResourceMask |= it-&gt;first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BusyResourceMask;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResourceManager::issueInstructionImpl(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InstrDesc &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ResourceWithCycles&gt;</a> &amp;Pipes) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Issue writes to non-group resources.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Issue writes to groups with only a single resource unit available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Update reserved groups (if any)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Add any remaining resource usage requests to a Worklist.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, ResourceUsage&gt;</a>, 4&gt; Worklist;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ResourceWithUsage = std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, ResourceUsage&gt;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResourceWithUsage &amp;R : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a>.Resources) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CycleSegment &amp;CS = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.second.CS;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CS.size()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">      releaseResource(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.first);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(CS.begin() == 0 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid &#123;Start, End&#125; cycles!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.second.isReserved()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0eea77e7bfa82e0219d2ec7b4efbc94f">llvm::popcount</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.first) &gt; 1) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected a group!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mark this group as reserved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.second.isReserved());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BusyResources&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#a961b7aeaca000c803c0f4b1df4d26c27">ResourceRef</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.first, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.first)&#93; += CS.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResourceState &amp;RS = &#42;Resources&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#ae652ac0aafced9e7ef6249d3b4e50171">getResourceStateIndex</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.first)&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RS.isAResourceGroup() &amp;&amp; RS.getNumReadyUnits() &gt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Worklist.push&#95;back(R);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#a961b7aeaca000c803c0f4b1df4d26c27">ResourceRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea2ab1f3f893823298751fdf60b4e0365a">Pipe</a> = selectPipe(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>.first);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/localizer-cpp/#a428090a453f41a199ef67fc3f2179fbc">use</a>(Pipe);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BusyResources&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea2ab1f3f893823298751fdf60b4e0365a">Pipe</a>&#93; += CS.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Pipes.emplace&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(Pipe, ReleaseAtCycles(CS.size())));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Step 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prioritize writes to groups with less available resources.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: this algorithm has quadratic complexity in the worst case scenario.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On average, this algorithm is expected to perform quite well and always</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// converge in very few iterations. That is mainly because instructions rarely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// consume more than two or three resource groups.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Worklist.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74cdbd1e4f731e7d7cd83461b8b1de0b">sort</a>(Worklist, &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResourceWithUsage &amp;Lhs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResourceWithUsage &amp;Rhs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResourceState &amp;LhsRS = &#42;Resources&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#ae652ac0aafced9e7ef6249d3b4e50171">getResourceStateIndex</a>(Lhs.first)&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResourceState &amp;RhsRS = &#42;Resources&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#ae652ac0aafced9e7ef6249d3b4e50171">getResourceStateIndex</a>(Rhs.first)&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t LhsReadyUnits = LhsRS.getNumReadyUnits();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t RhsReadyUnits = RhsRS.getNumReadyUnits();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LhsReadyUnits == RhsReadyUnits)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Lhs.first &lt; Rhs.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LhsReadyUnits &lt; RhsReadyUnits;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BusyResources&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea2ab1f3f893823298751fdf60b4e0365a">Pipe</a>&#93; += CS.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Pipes.emplace&#95;back(std::pair&lt;ResourceRef, ReleaseAtCycles&gt;(</span></CodeLine>
